CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Organic Shoppers relative to the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Organic Shoppers is to the {left} of the peak of Tech-savvy Consumers.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Organic Shoppers show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Organic Shoppers shows a {Single Peak Distribution}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Budget Shoppers reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Convenience-Oriented} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =97.5?
EVJ.A: At X =97.5,the label with the highest density is {Tech-savvy Consumers}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 26? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers}'s peak at {85},{Health-Conscious}'s peak at {84},{Budget Shoppers}'s peak at {85},{Premium Brands}'s peak at {78},{Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {27}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 57? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Convenience-Oriented}'s peak at {15},{Organic Shoppers}'s peak at {11},{Ethical Consumers}'s peak at {27}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Premium Brands or Tech-savvy Consumers?
NC.A: {Tech-savvy Consumers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Premium Brands or Budget Shoppers?
NC.A: {Budget Shoppers} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {4} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Convenience-Oriented}
